entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
